Screen.TooltipReference: Drop Item Here to Auto Equip.

Label.TooltipReference: Determines how well you mitigate incoming damage
Adds to your ability to make a successful melee attack
Shows the speed at which you attack - the base is 100%
Determines your encumbrance limit and is a factor in melee damage
Heroic Strength - Increases AC softcap and makes you hit harder
Total Strength - Capped Strength plus Heroic Strength
Influences your hit point and endurance totals
Total Stamina - Capped Stamina plus Heroic Stamina
Influences your AC and helps you avoid incoming damage
Heroic Agility - Adds overcap to dodge and block, increases falling distance
Total Agility - Capped Agility plus Heroic Agility
Influences success to make a successful attack, damage done, and chance to skill up
Heroic Dexterity - Adds to parry, riposte, and critical hit rates
Total Dexterity - Capped Dexterity plus Heroic Dexterity
Determines your mana (for some classes) and influences your chance to raise skills
Heroic Wisdom - Increases mana for wisdom based casters
Total Wisdom - Capped Wisdom plus Heroic Wisdom
Determines your mana (for some classes) and influences your chance to raise skills
Heroic Intelligence - Increases mana for intelligence based casters
Total Intelligence - Capped Intelligence plus Heroic Intelligence
Influences pricing on many vendors and influences success of charm and memorization spells
Heroic Charisma - Modifies faction hits both positive and negative
Total Charisma - Capped Charisma plus Heroic Charisma
Adds to your ability to make a successful melee attack
Adds to your ability to avoid incoming melee attacks
Adds a chance to return mana to you on a successful spell cast
Increases the rate at which you will trigger proc spells during melee
The number of endurance points you will regenerate while in combat
The number of hit points you will regenerate while in combat
The number of mana points you will regenerate while in combat
Reduces the damage you take from damage shield effects on your target
Adds damage to any damage shield effect you have
Reduces the base damage of incoming damage-over-time spell attacks
Adds to the effectiveness of your healing spells
Reduces the base damage of incoming melee attacks
Adds to the effectiveness of your damage spells
Reduces the base damage of incoming instant spell attacks
Allows your melee attacks to bypass your opponent's active defenses
Increases the chance for you to resist stun effects
Adds to damage when using the Backstab skill
Adds to damage when using the Bash skill
Adds to damage when using the Dragon Punch skill
Adds to damage when using the Eagle Strike skill
Adds to damage when using the Flying Kick skill
Adds to damage when using the Frenzy skill
Adds to damage when using the Kick skill
Adds to damage when using the Round Kick skill
Adds to damage when using the Tiger Claw skill
Experience towards your next alternate advancement point
Experience towards your next alternate advancement point
Experience towards your next group leadership point
Experience towards your next raid leadership point
Bonus experience earned from fellowship - Depleted as you kill mobs
Bonus alternate experience earned from fellowship - Depleted as you kill mobs
Experience towards your next alternate advancement point

Button.TooltipReference: Click here to toggle whether the current item will gain experience.
Click here to set all items listed to collect experience.
Click here to set all items listed to NOT collect experience.

Label.TooltipReference: Determines how well your mercenary mitigates incoming damage
Adds to your mercenary's ability to make a successful melee attack
Shows the speed at which your mercenary attacks - the base is 100%
A factor in your mercenary's melee damage
Influences your mercenary's hit point and endurance totals
Influences your mercenary's AC and helps you mercenary avoid incoming damage
Influences your mercenary's success to make a successful attack, damage done, and chance to skill up
Determines your mercenary's mana if healer
Influences your mercenary's success of charm and memorization spells
The number of hit points your mercenary will regenerate while in combat
The number of hit points your mercenary will regenerate while in combat
The number of mana points your mercenary will regenerate while in combat
The number of mana points your mercenary will regenerate while in combat
The number of endurance points your mercenary will regenerate while in combat
The number of endurance points your mercenary will regenerate while in combat
Adds to the effectiveness of your mercenary's healing spells
Adds to the effectiveness of your mercenary's healing spells
Adds to the effectiveness of your mercenary's damage spells
Adds to the effectiveness of your mercenary's damage spells
Loyalty Tokens are shared across all accounts
Velocity increases based on billing of active account

Button.TooltipReference: Click to create hard currency (items) of the highlighted type.
Click here to reclaim points from items of the highlighted type.

Button.Text: Show currencies that you don't have.
Button.TooltipReference: Toggle whether you want to display currencies that you have.
Upgrade selected character to a fully equipped level 85 character.
